evidence.claim: Attending Home Care utilizes AWS for cloud services to ensure secure data handling.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for patient data protection.
Integration with FHIR API standards allows for seamless data exchange in healthcare applications.
Utilizes EDI for billing purposes, specifically X12 transaction sets for healthcare insurance claims.
Utilizes Azure for various cloud computing services enhancing their operational efficiency.

icp.icp_reason: Company operates in healthcare with a focus on EDI/X12 transactions.
